line_1: But howsoever the strange World now thrives,
line_2: I must not look in my Teachers lives,

line_1: Telling me how their household thrives;
line_2: You'd laugh to see the honest wives

line_1: See here how ev'ry Plant in order thrives,
line_2: And spight of Clime the tend'rest Blossom lives.

line_1: And Surgery in barren Practice thrives,

line_2: Who burns the Bees, to rob their hives!

line_1: Why weeping virtue exil'd, flattery thrives,
line_2: Ask you, why whores live more belov'd than wives,
